tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE donations (
  donor_name VARCHAR(50),
  donor_email VARCHAR(100),
  donated_item VARCHAR(50),
  donation_date DATE,
  recipient_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE donations (
  donation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_id INT REFERENCES donors(donor_id),
  donation_item TEXT,
  donation_quantity INT,
  donation_date DATE,
  distribution_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE DonatedItems (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  item_description TEXT,
  donor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES Donors(donor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Distribution (
  distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id INT,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  recipient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  recipient_address TEXT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES DonatedItems(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE donations (
    donation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    donation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES donors(donor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES donated_items(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE distribution (
    distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    recipient_name VARCHAR(50),
    distribution_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES donated_items(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Donations (
  donation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_id INT,
  item_id INT,
  donation_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES Donors(donor_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES DonatedItems(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Distribution (
  distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  donation_id INT,
  recipient_id INT,
  distribution_date DATE,
  quantity_received INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (donation_id) REFERENCES Donations(donation_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (recipient_id) REFERENCES Recipients(recipient_id)
);
